step.cmd: In the Options section of the Field Outline, click Toggle script/form.
step.stepresult: This will reveal the script for returning values for this field in your report.To return to the form, click Toggle script/form again.

step.cmd: Enter or edit the expressions in this field, using Javascript and following the available parameters in the comments.
step.stepresult: These expressions will determine the content of the selected Result Listing field.

step.cmd: When you have finished editing the script, click Save. If you are unsure of your changes, click Cancel.
